</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set marker size.

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> a-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 width of marker </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> b-axis: [[Number]] - 1/2 height of marker </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
